title: #82: Questions & Answers
description:
With as crazy as things have gotten in 2020, it is safe to say that some people have questions about the direction that things are headed.

Have we gotten through the worst of it? Is this just the beginning? Are the vaccinations going to be made mandatory? Are you going to have to show a Health Passport before getting on an airplane in the future?

Answers to these questions and more on this episode as we sort through the massive amount of questions that we receive at the show, and try to make some sense of where this path is taking us for 2021 and beyond.
